quoteDoc: Amazon Prime Video Terms of Use
quoteText: If any term or condition of this Agreement is deemed invalid, void, or for any reason unenforceable, that part will be deemed severable and will not affect the validity and enforceability of any remaining term or condition.<
title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
